post:
A few of you may know me from my previous venture I started: Fliphost.net. Now I am looking for a few people to take my new venture through the signup process and standard usage for a few days and report any problems that might be found. I do not believe there are any at this time. 100% free during this period

Few highlights:

1 current location: Seattle
OpenVZ with KVM planned
Create your own servers out of a pool of resources
IPv4 and IPv6 - (Fully owned directly from ARIN)
Change resources on the fly

If you are interested in trying it out and providing some feedback signup @ [http://impactvps.com/](http://impactvps.com) for the VDR 4 plan. Use promocode: BETA.

Please submit any problems or feedback through ticket once you have signed up. All orders are manually approved.
